mapper.select: select count(*) atCount from attendance where to_char(today, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and mem_no = #{memNo}
select count(*) atCount from attendance where to_char(today, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and check_out is null and mem_no = #{memNo}
select count(*) atCount , ceil(sum(total_time) / 60) atSum , ceil(avg(total_time) / 60) atAvg from attendance where mem_no = #{memNo} and extract(year from today) = extract(year from sysdate)
select check_in from attendance where to_char(today, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and mem_no = ${memNo}
select check_out from attendance where to_char(today, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and mem_no = ${memNo}
mapper.insert: insert into attendance ( attend_no , mem_no , today , check_in ) values ( seq_adno.nextval , #{memNo} , sysdate , to_char(current_timestamp, 'hh24 : mi') )
mapper.update: update attendance set check_out = to_char(current_timestamp, 'hh24 : mi') , total_time = (to_date(to_char(current_timestamp, 'HH24 : MI'), 'HH24 : MI') - to_date(check_in, 'HH24 : MI')) * 24 * 60 where mem_no = #{memNo} and check_out is null and check_in is not null
mapper.select: select salary_list_no , s.mem_no , working_year , working_month , working_hour , overtime_hour , salary , salary_day , p.posi_no , base_salary , hourly_pay from salary_list s join member m on (m.mem_no = s.mem_no) join position p on (p.posi_no = m.posi_no) order by working_year desc , working_month desc

select o.ec_doc_no , off_start , off_end , e.ec_doc_name , ec_enrolldate , ec_status from off o join ec_document e on (e.ec_doc_no = o.ec_doc_no) join member m on (m.mem_no = e.mem_no) where e.mem_no = #{memNo} order by ec_enrolldate desc
